summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds to a portion of Tract 25, Merrick's Acre Tracts for street purposes for the improvement of South Bangor Street from the south portion of the intersection of 55th Avenue South/South Bangor Street to approximately 200 feet to the north by paving, installing curbs, gutters and wheelchair ramps and upgrading a portion of the street lighting system, as authorized by Ordinance 109247 (South Bangor Street at 55th Avenue South).
